name: Glimmer of Gold
description:
Colt, a mysterious treasure hunter and thief who lives in a fantasy medieval world in which magic exists. In a bar he heard of a rumor that up far into the mountain, at the very top a pitch black hole can be found. Except for one thing, a glimmer of gold at the bottom. Nobody dares to get close to it as all who enter were never to return. The hero of our story is not however scared of that and together with his speaking cat familiar Umbra he goes on an adventure into the chasm!

Let the treasure hunt begin.

You (the main character) are controlling Colt. You enter the pitch black hole only to realize you are inside of a procedural generated dungeon! 

An exciting adventure awaits!

To get through the dungeon, you(the player) fight your way through rooms filled with enemies and adjust your strategies in combat to the weapons available to you!
